e23-co2060-Computer-vision-and-AI-lab-sy.title: Computer vision and AI lab system
e23-co2060-Computer-vision-and-AI-lab-sy.description: A unified web platform designed for the Computer Vision & AI Lab, integrating a public research portfolio with a robust internal management system for streamlining equipment bookings and GPU resource scheduling.

e23-co2060-MPhil-PhD-Lifecycle-Managemen.title: MPhil PhD Lifecycle Management System
e23-co2060-MPhil-PhD-Lifecycle-Managemen.description: The MPhil & PhD Lifecycle Management System is a centralized web platform to track postgraduate students from registration to thesis submission. It supports supervision, progress reviews, ethics approvals, document management, dashboards, and automated reminders, improving transparency, compliance, and administrative efficiency at faculty level.
